item.title: Report X-2024072450
item.description:
Report X-2024072450

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-07T15:13:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-30
  • City: BLOOMINGTON
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024072450 Upon inspection of the package it was discovered that the box was wet from its top left corner. with further investigation and opening the box it was found that both bottles of zeps degreaser had been slowly leaking due to both of their caps not being properly secure. resulting in the internal leakage. 2. X-2024080022 upon inspection of the package it was discovered that the box was wet from its top left corner. with further investigation and opening the box it was discovered that both bottles of industrial degreaser had loose caps which resulted in their internal leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024072191
item.description:
Report X-2024072191

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: SANTA FE SPRINGS
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024072191 The package was found damaged by the venting of the closure allowing the tablet powder inside to seep out and damage the box. The package has a oxidizer sticker. 2. X-2024072192 The package was damaged when the cleaning product seeped out of the lid onto the box. The package had no paperwork to match the oxidizer sticker. 3. X-2024072193 The package was found torn and upon inspection, it was found that the product vented allowing the cleaner to damage the box. 4. X-2024072195 The package was found torn by the vented cleaning product inside. the closure seeped allowing the powder tablets inside to tear through the box. 5. X-2024072196 The package was found torn by the cleaning product inside and upon inspection the package seems to be a undeclared hazmat. 6. X-2024072213 attachment Name:thumbnail_IMG_5964.jpg
